data.name: Chicken Parmesan
data.description: Chicken Parmesan is a classic for a reason! Chicken cutlets, breaded and fried, smothered with tomato sauce, and covered with mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses are so good. Serve with pasta or on a roll.
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts (about 1 1/2 pounds total), pounded to 1/2-inch thickness
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

data.name: Chicken Marsala
data.description: Chicken Marsala is an Italian-American dish of golden pan-fried chicken cutlets and mushrooms in a rich Marsala wine sauce. Though it’s a classic restaurant dish, it’s really easy to make at home. With just one pan, you can have it on the dinner table in 45 minutes.
ingredients: 4 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, pounded 1/4-inch thick
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
8 ounces crimini or porcini mushrooms, stemmed and halved

data.name: Chicken Piccata
data.description: Chicken Piccata! Sautéed chicken breast with buttery lemon caper sauce and capers. Serve with angel hair pasta.
ingredients: 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts, halved horizontally and pounded to 1/4-inch thickness
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 cup dry white wine or chicken stock

data.name: Chicken Cacciatore
data.description: Chicken Cacciatore is an easy weeknight skillet dinner that can be ready in under an hour. Serve over rice to soak up the sauce and make sure to get every last drop of that silky sauce.
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts (about 1 1/2 pounds total), pounded to 1/2-inch thickness
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 cup dry white wine or chicken stock

data.name: Chicken Florentine
data.description: Chicken Florentine is a rich, creamy dish named for the Italian city of Florence (Firenze). This version uses boneless, skinless chicken breasts served over a bed of baby spinach, mushrooms, and shallots.
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts (about 1 1/2 pounds total), pounded to 1/2-inch thickness
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 cup dry white wine or chicken stock

data.name: Chicken Fettuccine Alfredo
data.description: Chicken Fettuccine Alfredo! Pasta with a creamy Parmesan sauce with chicken and mushrooms.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 cup dry white wine or chicken stock

data.name: Chicken Pot Pie
data.description: Chicken Pot Pie is a comfort food favorite! This chicken pot pie recipe has a flaky, buttery crust, a creamy sauce, and a hearty mix of chicken and vegetables.

data.name: Chicken Enchiladas
data.description: Chicken Enchiladas! These are the BEST Chicken Enchiladas ever! Perfectly cooked chicken, green chilies, cheese and a creamy sauce make these Chicken Enchiladas the best ever!
ingredients: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese, divided

data.name: Chicken Marsala
data.description: Chicken Marsala is an Italian-American dish of golden pan-fried chicken cutlets and mushrooms in a rich Marsala wine sauce. Though it’s a classic restaurant dish, it’s really easy to make at home. With just one pan, you can have it on the dinner table in 45 minutes.
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts (about 1 1/2 pounds total), pounded to 1/2-inch thickness
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

data.description: Chicken Parmesan is a classic for a reason! Chicken cutlets, breaded and fried, smothered with tomato sauce, and covered with mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses are so good. Serve with pasta or on a roll.
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts (about 1 1/2 pounds total), pounded to 1/2-inch thickness
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

data.name: Chicken Piccata
data.description: Chicken Piccata! Sautéed chicken breast with buttery lemon caper sauce and pasta.
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts (about 1 1/2 pounds total), pounded to 1/2-inch thickness
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 cup dry white wine or chicken broth
